mapper.insert: insert into titles (emp_no, title, from_date, to_date) values (#{empNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{toDate,jdbcType=DATE})
